ValidationRule.description: Customer Legal Signer and Signer Email fields have to be filled to launch the DocuSign Signature process.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(ISCHANGED(StageName), NOT($Profile.Name = "System Administrator"), Platform__c = "Bynder", NOT(ISPICKVAL(Account.Automatic_Renewal__c,"Yes")), NOT(Stop_automatic_renewal__c = TRUE), ISPICKVAL(StageName,'Signature Stage'), OR( ISBLANK(Customer_Legal_Signer__c), ISBLANK(Customer_Legal_Signer_Email__c)), ISPICKVAL(Type,'Existing Business-Renewal') )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Customer Legal Signer and Signer Email on opportunity is required to auto-populate the Signer information in the DocuSign Signature process.
